duties_responsibilities.duty: Consistently manufacture “great tasting” sausage products according to specifications.
Plan and execute the daily work required to supply Formulation team with ground rework and sifted inclusions.
Safely and efficiently use grinder and sifting equipment.
Receive all raw materials and ensure raw material quality.
Coordinate flow of inbound/outbound products and materials via phone, radio, email, and face to face interactions at the shipping/receiving doors.
Participate in scheduling and tracking inbound post rigor loads.
Load outbound trailers per specifications and restock and manage production supplies as needed.
Operate refers and maintain proper trailer temps as well as stage production materials for the RAW / RTE operations.
Verify inventory and cycle count bins to ensure warehouse accuracy and reconcile supply inventories after daily production.
